Produce seasonal stats for a site

Source: R/seasonal_stats.R
seasonal_stats.Rd

Produces a data frame of seasonal stats.

Usage

seasonal_stats(core, clip = NULL)

Arguments

core

Core data frame, produced by stitch_site

clip

Optionally supply a pair of dates (in yyyy-mm-dd format) to clip seasonal statistics

Value

List of:

table

Data frame with a column of the statistic name and a column with the numeric statistics

formatted

Data frame with a column of the statistic name and a column with the formatted statistics

On this page

Developed by Ethan Plunkett, Bradley Compton.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
